entries.title: String Interpolation in Python
entries.content: Learned about f-strings and their performance benefits compared to traditional string formatting methods. F-strings are not only more readable but also faster in execution.

entries.title: React Server Components
entries.content: Explored React Server Components and how they can improve application performance by reducing client-side JavaScript bundle size.

entries.title: CSS Container Queries
entries.content: Discovered how to use container queries for more granular control over responsive design, allowing components to adapt based on their container's size rather than viewport.

entries.title: Git Interactive Rebase
entries.content: Mastered interactive rebase in Git for cleaning up commit history. Learned how to squash, edit, and reorder commits effectively.

entries.title: TypeScript Generics
entries.content: Deep dive into TypeScript generics and their practical applications in creating reusable, type-safe components and functions.

entries.title: Docker Multi-Stage Builds
entries.content: Learned how to optimize Docker images using multi-stage builds, significantly reducing final image size while maintaining functionality.

entries.title: Web Authentication API
entries.content: Explored the WebAuthn API for implementing passwordless authentication using biometric sensors and security keys.

entries.title: CSS :has() Selector
entries.content: Discovered the power of the :has() selector in CSS for parent element selection, opening new possibilities for dynamic styling.

entries.title: Python AsyncIO
entries.content: Learned about asynchronous programming in Python using AsyncIO, including coroutines, event loops, and task management.

entries.title: Rust Ownership System
entries.content: Started learning Rust's unique ownership system and how it ensures memory safety without garbage collection.
